sentences.translation: 约翰孩子气地咧嘴一笑。

sentences.sentence: Championing the cause of the solitary artisan comes naturally to Kalin, a boyishly ambitious Nonconformist who wouldn't look out of place at the local skate park.
sentences.translation: 孤独的工匠的冠军事业自然而然的落到了罗布·卡林的手里——这个有点稚气的却雄心勃勃的不墨守成规者，并且在当地的滑冰公园他从来不向外看。
